platform_weight.description: What platform is the customer interested in?

Teams_Involved_Weight.description: Number of customer's teams invloved in presales (Marketing, Sales Ops, etc.)?

Trial_Weight.description: Was SE team involved in trial?

Regulated_Weight.description: Is the customer in a regulated industry?

Timeline_Weight.description: Does the customer want to deploy in less then 60 days?

Division_Weight.description: How many regions will have unique libraries of Content?

Pieces_of_Content_Weight.description: How many pieces of content will they be launching with?

Integrations_Weight.description: Is the customer interested in out of the box integrations (Sharepoint, Box Sync, Marketo, etc.)?

Ultimate_Limit.description: Upper limit for ULTIMATE outcome. Note, CUSTOM SOW will be anything above this limit
